channel.title: Dividend Increase on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Dividend Increase on FinanClub

item.title: HST
item.description: score:40 Chances: Host Hotels & Resorts provided an update on recent weather events, showing concern for potential impacts on the tourism industry. The company reported strong Q1 2023 results, with FFO and revenues beating estimates, and it raised its 2023 view. Host Hotels & Resorts announced an increased second-quarter dividend, which may attract dividend-focused investors.

item.title: RF
item.description: score:56 Chances: Regions Financial has been aided by growth in Net Interest Income (NII) and loan growth, which could contribute positively to the company’s financial performance. The company’s upcoming dividend is expected to be larger than the previous year’s, which can attract income-focused investors.
